title: WTF
review: What did I just watch? I'm must not be smart or deep enough to understand this movie. Can I please get the time back that I wasted watching this movie.

title: Not for me
review: Maybe I watched a different movie. I truthfully didn't connect with any of the characters. I had high hopes but I walked away stunned but not in a good way.

title: OMG
review: Wonderful from beginning to end. Can't wait for the next installment.

title: If black panther was white would there be all of this hate?
review:
Why are Caucasians so angry with this movie? We have grown up with mostly white superhero's with the same tired story line, glorifying white pride and privilege. The one time a African American superhero with black pride comes out, it's a problem. I'm really not a superhero fan, but I did enjoy this movie as well as Dr. Strange. 
Cast 10/10
Fight Scenes 8/10
Story Line 8/10
Special Effects 8/10
